# IKImageBrowserDropOperation

**Structure**

These constants specify the locations for dropping items onto the browser view. Used by the method [doc://com.apple.quartz/documentation/Quartz/IKImageBrowserView/setDrop(_:dropOperation:)].

## Declaration

```swift
struct IKImageBrowserDropOperation
```

## Constants

- **IKImageBrowserDropOn**: Drop the item on the cell.
- **IKImageBrowserDropBefore**: Drop the item before the cell.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**
- **init(rawValue:)**

## Instance Properties

- **rawValue**

## Informal Protocols

- **IKImageBrowserCellState**: The possible states for the browser cell. These values are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartz/documentation/Quartz/IKImageBrowserCell/cellState()] method.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
